text: Columba Domínguez Adalid (March 4, 1929 – August 13, 2014) was a Mexican movie actress. She was married to Mexican director Emilio Fernández. Dominguez was known for her role in Pueblerina (1949). Dominguez died from respiratory failure in Mexico City, aged 85.Fallece Columba Domínguez, estrella del cine mexicano ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Disease-related deaths in Mexico Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:People from Sonora
title: Columba Domínguez
